targets.query: SELECT difference(mean("bounced")) + difference(mean("deferred")) + difference(mean("delivered")) + difference(mean("discarded")) + difference(mean("forwarded")) + difference(mean("held")) + difference(mean("received")) + difference(mean("rejected")) FROM "zimbra_stats" WHERE ("host" = 'mail.callfin.ltd') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("err_out") FROM "net" WHERE ("host" = 'mail.callfin.ltd') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
